actions.action:
cat << 'ENDOFFILE' > strategy.py
import random
def row_strategy(history):
    if not history:
        return 0
    # If opponent copied our last move 80% of the time, we should vary our moves to break patterns
    # Start with 0 to align with baseline preference, but introduce randomness to avoid being predicted
    last_move = history[-1][0]
    # Randomly switch to 1 every few rounds to prevent opponent from copying
    if len(history) % 3 == 0:
        return 1 - last_move
    return last_move
ENDOFFILE
